price: Enti gyae Mene obi a, ͻfa saa Asεm yi nkontompo no; Yεde no nkakra nkakra bεsͻ wͻn mu aberε a wͻnnim ho hwee.
arabic: فَذَرۡنِي وَمَن يُكَذِّبُ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡحَدِيثِۖ سَنَسۡتَدۡرِجُهُم مِّنۡ حَيۡثُ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fadharnī waman yukadhibu bihādhā al-ḥadīthi sanastadrijuhum min ḥaythu lā yaʿlamūna
